context_text: <A> yeah i don't get into the easter bunny i don't get into and i don't tell them their is an easter bunny i basically tell them about the resurrection of christ and this is the reason we celebrate them now i don't keep them from going easter egg hunting or anything / <B> right / <A> you know but and and even as far as uh christmas i don't keep them from watching cartoons but i try to keep it more on the real basis but um i just never serve purpose of have you know telling them about santa clause because you know usually they know and / <B> right / <A> get into that now you know my husband will tell them you know look you know and he may we might even write him a little note that says from santa but pretty much they know that really there's no santa { you } / <B> [ right ] / <A> know but this is just part of what we do around christmas or what people do around christmas but this sis not a foundation this is just added to make fun so you guys can enjoy your holiday / <B> right / <A> but we don't get into you know the seriousness because when i coming up i really did think there was a santa clause because they was so devout about telling us about santa clause more so then they told us about a jesus so i never really understood the reason for christmas i thought it was gifts santa clause bringing us gifts / <B> right / <A> and i just don't want that to be my children's idea and and understanding about christmas you know but i don't i don't go crazy yes you know they hear santa clause or whatever or you know if my husband mention it to them because they know the real truth about christmas is to celebrate christ's birthday i mean everything else just added is just you know man made to have a to kind of you know bring a little spice and enjoy christmas / <B> right
